timeline.message: Implement tokenizer and a few helper classes to process query

timeline.bodyText:
nit: stylewise we usually don't use paragraph for field comment.
Just use "//..." for short comment.
timeline.author: kikkyo

timeline.bodyText: maybe add a TODO to make this user configurable.
timeline.author: kikkyo
kikkyo

timeline.bodyText: So we rely on the error message to identify if they used legacy sql?
timeline.author: kikkyo

replies.bodyText: Here I mean the error message represents the table in legacySQL format, which is project:dataset.table. I guess we could be an issue for BigQuery to update this error message.
replies.author: mingen-pan
